assetMetadata.description: Include "aws:asset:*" CloudFormation metadata for resources that use assets

bootstrapBucketName.description:
The name of the CDK toolkit bucket; bucket will be created and
must not exist

bootstrapCustomerKey.description:
Create a Customer Master Key (CMK) for the bootstrap
bucket (you will be charged but can customize
permissions, modern bootstrapping only)

bootstrapKmsKeyId.description: AWS KMS master key ID used for the SSE-KMS encryption

caBundlePath.description:
Path to CA certificate to use when validating HTTPS
requests.

cfnExecutionPolicy.description:
The Managed Policy ARNs that should be attached to the
role performing deployments into this environment (may be repeated, modern bootstrapping only)

color.default: - `true` unless the environment variable `NO_COLOR` is set
color.description: Show colors and other style from console output

customPermissionsBoundary.description: Use the permissions boundary specified by name.

debug.description:
enable emission of additional debugging information, such as creation stack
traces of tokens

ec2Creds.description: Force trying to fetch EC2 instance credentials

environments.default: - Bootstrap all environments referenced in the CDK app or determine an environment from local configuration.
environments.description:
The target AWS environments to deploy the bootstrap stack to.
Uses the following format: `aws://<account-id>/<region>`

execute.description:
Whether to execute ChangeSet (--no-execute will NOT execute
the ChangeSet)

force.description: Always bootstrap even if it would downgrade template version

ignoreErrors.description: Ignores synthesis errors, which will likely produce an invalid output

json.description:
Use JSON output instead of YAML when templates are printed
to STDOUT

lookups.description:
Perform context lookups.

Synthesis fails if this is disabled and context lookups need
to be performed

pathMetadata.description: Include "aws:cdk:path" CloudFormation metadata for each resource

profile.description: Use the indicated AWS profile as the default environment

proxy.description:
Use the indicated proxy. Will read from
HTTPS_PROXY environment if specified

publicAccessBlockConfiguration.description:
Block public access configuration on CDK toolkit
bucket (enabled by default)

qualifier.description:
String which must be unique for each bootstrap stack. You
must configure it on your CDK app if you change this
from the default.

roleArn.description: Role to pass to CloudFormation for deployment

showTemplate.description:
Instead of actual bootstrapping, print the current
CLI\'s bootstrapping template to stdout for customization

staging.description:
Copy assets to the output directory

Needed for local debugging the source files with SAM CLI

strict.description: Do not construct stacks with warnings

template.description:
Use the template from the given file instead of the
built-in one (use --show-template to obtain an example)

terminationProtection.description:
Toggle CloudFormation termination protection on the
bootstrap stacks

toolkitStackName.description: The name of the CDK toolkit stack to create

trust.description:
The AWS account IDs that should be trusted to perform
deployments into this environment (may be repeated,
modern bootstrapping only)

trustForLookup.description:
The AWS account IDs that should be trusted to look
up values in this environment (may be repeated,
modern bootstrapping only)

usePreviousParameters.description:
Use previous values for existing parameters (you must specify
all parameters on every deployment if this is disabled)
